fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level reference [DeptID] converted to 'HR Dataset'[DeptID]. This is a per-row transformation, so it is implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: dep calc 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Expression [dep calc 1] * [MarriedID] converted to 'HR Dataset'[dep calc 1] * 'HR Dataset'[MarriedID]. This is row-level arithmetic, so it is implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: dep calc 3
fixes.solution_explanation: Aggregation SUM([dep calc 2]) converted to SUM('HR Dataset'[dep calc 2]). Because the expression uses an aggregate, it is implemented as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
